QuestData.Title: Concentrated Fear
QuestData.Description: Amber is power. It brings life.$B$BThis... dread amber you brought me has been twisted. It is concentrated fear.$B$BThe Vor'thik know this well. Their kypari has been completely engulfed by sha, and they use the dread amber to quicken their own swarmborn.$B$BBring me the crystals used by the Vor'thik fear-shapers in their rituals. The Klaxxi will study them and decide on a protocol for disposal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 4 Dread Amber Foci from Vor'thik Fear-Shapers at Kypari Vor.
QuestData.RewardText: What would happen, I wonder, if you ate one? What would it do to your soft, pink insides?
